title: (x) "Service de Placement des Enseignants Routiers" simple sans - Helvetica Cond {Thomas Binder}
content:
SORRY, this are a real shame of my part, I know this fonts and actually I can’t remenber.  
Can someone help me please

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071224133348im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/RRR_3556.jpg)

 [‹ (x) "Motocicli Zaccardo" Art Deco sans in Nike advertising - (similar to) FF Typeface Six {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071224133348/http:/www.typophile.com/node/31556 "Go to previous forum topic") [Alaska Airlines font circa 1950 ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071224133348/http:/www.typophile.com/node/31545 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Marc C

comments.content:
Nah, no spurs on a Univers G, and the S and R are different, too.

Maybe Helvetica Narrow?

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/helvetica/narrow/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071224133348/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/helvetica/narrow/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/helvetica/narrow/")
Helvetica narrow is really looking the same whit a small difference on the S and the C, they are more narrow
Helvetica LT Std Light Condensed, i think.
